column2: BRIEF-Marine Products Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.22 April 25 (Reuters) - Marine Products Corp: * MARINE PRODUCTS CORPORATION REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * LOWER EFFECTIVE TAX RATE FOR Q1 OF 2018 INCREASED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE BY $0.02 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
